```{r imaging}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis

imageFiles <- list.files(params$imagedir, pattern = ".png$", recursive = TRUE, full.names = TRUE)
axialImage <- paste0("{", imageFiles[grep("AX_T2_FLAIR", imageFiles)], "}")
sagittalImage <- paste0("{", imageFiles[grep("Sagittal_3D_Accelerated_MPRAGE", imageFiles)], "}")

scanDate <- format(subjinfo[subjinfo$redcap_event_name == "annual_forms_arm_1" & 
                              !is.na(subjinfo$scan_date), "scan_date", drop = TRUE], "%B %d, %Y")

radiologyRead <- 
  paste0("{", subjinfo[subjinfo$redcap_event_name == "annual_forms_arm_1" & 
                         !is.na(subjinfo$radiology_read), "radiology_read", drop = TRUE], "}")

if(length(imageFiles) >= 1){
  ltex <- paste(readLines("sections/imaging/latex/imaging.tex"), collapse = "\n")
  ltex <- glue::glue(
    ltex, scanDate = scanDate, axialImage = axialImage, sagittalImage = sagittalImage, 
    radiologyRead = radiologyRead, .open = "{{", .close = "}}"
    )
  cat(paste0("", ltex, ""), sep = "\n")
}
```
